subject: Validate IdentityManager assistantId/identity IDs (path traversal guard)
description: Harden packages/core/src/identity/identity-manager.ts: validate assistantId in constructor and identity IDs loaded from index/active or passed to read/delete/switch. Reject/ignore invalid IDs (no path separators, safe regex) so identityPath and identitiesRoot cannot escape basePath. Add tests for invalid IDs and active/index poisoning.
